cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.LG, cs.SY, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with the problem of allocating radio channels to links in a wireless network, which is a problem in the field of wireless networking (cs.NI). The problem is formulated as a generic linear bandit problem, which is a topic in machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also discusses the use of Integer Linear Programming (ILP), which is a topic in optimization (cs.SY). Additionally, the paper deals with the problem of maximizing network throughput, which is a topic in information theory (cs.IT).
